|brand = BeagleBoard |model = BeagleBone AI |submodelappend = yes |submodel = -64 |revision = Rev B |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Texas Instruments;TDA4VM;TDA4VM88TGBALFR; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A72 |cpu1spd = 2.0 GHz |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = eMMC |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Kingston;EMMC16G-TB29; |flash1size = 16 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = LPDDR4 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 4 GiB |ram1chip = Kingston;Q3222PM1WDGTK; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Texas Instruments;DP83867CR; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 24:76:25
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2021.01; |stockos = Linux;5.10.90;Debian 11;
|exp_if_types = NGFF (M.2), USB 3.0, Micro SD Card slot |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 3 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 3 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 3-pin header,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = yes,, 10-pad header,, TAG-CONNECT
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Micro SD Card slot, Mini DisplayPort, MIPI DSI, MIPI CSI, UART, GPIO, heatsink |addchip = Four-Port USB 3.0 Hub;TI;TUSB8041;;1;,,, 4K I2C Serial EEPROM;Microchip;24FC04HT-I/OT;;1;,,, 2.8-5.5V PMIC w/ 5 Buck & 4 LDO Regulators;TI;TPS6594-Q1;;2;,,, 2.75-6V Adjustable-Frequency Step-Down Converter;TI;TPS62813;;1;,,, 15kV ESD-Protected Dual CMOS Switch Debouncer;Maxim;MAX6817;;1;,,, USB Type-C Configuration Channel Logic & Port Control;TI;TUSB322I;;1;,,, Dual Channel Adjustable Current-Limited Power Switch;TI;TPS2561;;1;,,, Single Buffer/Driver with Open-Drain Outputs;TI;SN74LVC1G07DCKR;;3;,,, Single Positive-Edge-Triggered D-Type Flip-Flop;TI;SN74LVC2G74;;1;,,, 2.7V-22V, 4.5A Power Mux w/ Seamless Switchover;TI;TPS2121;;1;,,, 1.5A Low-Dropout Linear Regulator w/ Soft-Start;TI;TPS74801;;2;,,, Wide Input Range Synchronous Buck Controller;TI;LM5141;;1;,,, Dual Buffer & Driver w/ 3-State Outputs;TI;SN74LVC2G241;;2;,,, Low-Voltage Single FET Bus Switch;TI;SN74CBTLV1G125;;1;,,, Single 2-Input Positive AND Gate;TI;SN74LVC1G08DCKR;;1;,,, 8-bit Bidirectional Voltage-Level Translator;TI;TXB0108;1;,,, 4-Bit Bidirectional Voltage-Level Shifter;TI;TXS0104E;;1;,,, Programmable-Delay Supervisory Circuit;TI;TPS3808;;1;,,, 5.5V, 2A On-Resistance Load Switch;TI;TPS22918;;1;,,, 5.7V, 6A On-Resistance Load Switch;TI;TPS22965;;1;,,, Power Distribution Switch (USB 3.0);TI;TPS2553;;1;,,, Single Schmitt-Trigger Buffer;TI;SN74LVC1G17;;1;,,, ESD Suppressor Diode;TI;TPD4E05U06;;2;,,, ESD Protection Diode;TI;TPD1E05U06;;10; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = debian |defaultpass = temppwd |manuf = SeeedStudio |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 06/2022 |estprice = 187 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== :Model/Brand - [[BeagleBone AI-64]] ([[BeagleBoard]].org [[BeagleBone AI]])
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Texas Instruments]] ''Jacinto'' TDA4VM :Dual Core ARM (Cortex-A72) @2.0GHz, :3x Dual Core ARM (Cortex-M4F) @1.0GHz <!-- :2x Six Core Programmable Real-Time Unit and Industrial Communication SubSystem (@333MHz), :C7x + MMA (8 TOPS) and 2x C66x floating-point VLIW DSPs --> *GPU: ''PowerVR Rogue'' 8XE GE8430 3D :VPU: 2x 1080p30 H.264 encode, :8x 1080p30 H.264/H.265 decode *Storage: 16GB (eMMC) flash, :TF card (max.128GB)/MMC card slot *RAM: 4GB (LPDDR4) SDRAM *Network: 1x Gigabit Ethernet port *PCIe: NGFF M.2 (E key) socket *USB: 2x USB 3.0 ports, 1x USB (Type-C) for :power and superspeed dual-role controller *Power Source: 5V/3A via barrel or USB (Type-C)
==Links of Interest== *[https://www.hackster.io/news/beagleboard-org-launches-high-performance-embedded-ai-64-bit-beaglebone-ai-64-board-91386326837d ''BeagleBoard.org Launches High-Performance Embedded AI 64-Bit BeagleBone AI-64 Board'' on '''hackster.io'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2022/06/15/beaglebone-ai-64-sbc-features-ti-tda4vm-cortex-a72-r5f-soc-with-8-tops-ai-accelerator/ ''BeagleBone AI-64 SBC features TI TDA4VM Cortex-A72/R5F SoC'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[https://linuxgizmos.com/beaglebone-ai-64-comes-with-tda4vm-soc-from-texas-instruments/ ''BeagleBone AI-64 comes with TDA4VM SoC from Texas Instruments'' on '''LinuxGizmos''']
